MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at midday in order to carry out emergency repairs to a damaged substation, caused by a third party, and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:11am on Thursday, 15 April 2021
